title: New Warmogs is so funny.
body:
Ooh I just Shyvana Dragons Descent dived your team and got bursted down to 400 HP...
http://apollo-uploads-oce.s3.amazonaws.com/1441561399/untitled.png
...And I'm back to 5K HP again.

replies.body: or you can recall and get it back even quicker whilst being able to spend your gold on items to be even stronger and have better stats than just health as a supposed tanky item. then on her you've got a W to get into the game even faster
Or you could just stack health to get more out of that bonus armour and MR.
fiora eats high hp targets regardless of armor/mr % hp true damage op, especially when it reaches that 35% max hp per passive proc mark
um a good Fiora will never be dumb enough to go full AD and no CDR/health/whatever Fioras build.

That's just the problem, she can be tanky and still do that much % it scales off of her lv + 3% +  her ad, giving more than you would think. So she can be tanky and have her cdr while still doing damage.

Having something like:

120 mr
3.5k hp
200 armor
and then more than enough ad to melt your face and get large % from your passive

Yeah but you can just go around and push waves without taking damage from them and with 5K HP heal for 100 HP a second.

I like flat HP on Shyvana when I can get away with it (Not versing a lot of % HP damage Champions) - If I am versing % Damage I'll try to take hybrid defense items (HP and armor, HP and MR) or if I can farm will take warmogs then a hybrid defense item or 2 (HP and armor or HP and MR I mean) Warmogs is my fave item because Shyv has stat gains and I play her a lot and the HP is hugely reinforced by her defensive stats making her super tanky. This change to it (Warmogs heart) lets you fully heal without having to back or just heal heaps in like 10-15 seconds and then go for another engage when you're sieging their base or whatever and is sooooooo good.

With 5K HP - after 8 seconds of not taking damage it activates and will heal you for roughly 100HP a second so that's 30 seconds roughly to be fully healed - after a successful engage and a lot of damage soaking this lets you keep pressure on or continue farming or going for objectives. I see your point though about recalling to buy items but as a Tanky Jungler I like being able to heal heaps late game without having to go back so I can split push, take jungle or do objectives and often I used to be recalling just to heal - now I can continue my efforts because of this item and when I do pick it up, I absolutely adore it.
